meanings.definition: The lower layer of water in a stratified lake, typically colder and denser than the upper layer.
meanings.sent1: The hypolimnions hold the coldest water in the lake.
meanings.sent2: Fish in the lake prefer the warmer upper layer over the hypolimnions.
meanings.sent3: The hypolimnions decided to throw a party to warm up a bit.
meanings.sent4: The secrets of the lake are buried deep within the hypolimnions.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the hypolimnions felt like diving into a chilly abyss.

meanings.definition: The region of water below the thermocline in a stratified body of water.
meanings.sent1: Divers often explore the mysterious hypolimnions beneath the thermocline.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the unique ecosystem of the hypolimnions to understand its importance.
meanings.sent3: The hypolimnions were jealous of the attention the upper layers received.
meanings.sent4: The hypolimnions whispered secrets to the creatures dwelling above.
meanings.sent5: The darkness of the hypolimnions concealed hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.
